meanings.definition: The position or status of being a doctor.
meanings.sent1: Her hard work and dedication earned her the prestigious doctorships at the hospital.
meanings.sent2: Many aspire to achieve the esteemed doctorships in the medical field.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the top doctorships was fierce, with candidates showcasing their expertise.
meanings.sent4: In the world of healthcare, obtaining doctorships is like reaching the peak of a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The doctorships symbolize years of study and commitment to healing others.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of a doctor.
meanings.sent1: His doctorships in surgery were renowned throughout the region.
meanings.sent2: Years of experience and training are required to master the art of doctorships.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly claimed her doctorships in diagnosing common colds among her friends.
meanings.sent4: His precision and expertise in surgery showcased his exceptional doctorships.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing his doctorships in action, one could see the true mastery of his craft.
